title: Ticket #249: Enhance checkpoint capabilities: compression, large checkpoint files
description:
This is part of the large patch set contributed by Dan Forrest.

It (re)enables support for compressed checkpoint images. Additionally, several data types have been widened which provides support for checkpoint images larger than 2GB (or maybe 4GB; I'm not sure what the current limit is).

Chunks from the annotated diff of Dan's changes (which Todd has) that are associated with this ticket are labeled with a (1).
remarks:
